resources.string: 在 Android 4.3+ 開啟應用程式作業 ，並加入至原生設定選單。

Xposed Installer is not installed on your system and you are running Android 4.4+. \"%1$s\" is likely disabled, but you may try to launch it using the \"%2$s\" button below. Please note that your device must be rooted to install the Xposed Framework.
Changing these settings may break AppOpsXposed. Use with care!
顯示程式圖示。如果您的\"設定\"中找不到\"應用程式作業\"才需要勾選。
Use a fix that alleviates layout issues in the per-app \"應用程式作業\" screen.
Use only the minimum patches required for \"應用程式作業\" to work; in this case, a launcher icon must be used. Use this if you experience crashes.
實驗功能。使用者風險自負！

These features are highly experimental and may cause your phone to get stuck in a boot-loop and become unusable. Use only if you know how to disable Xposed (or this 模組) from recovery mode or a shell. You have been warned!
上傳經由 email/Dropbox/Google Drive/等；需要root。
Fixes a crash in a system component that prevents \"%1$s\" from loading.
Use an alternate 應用程式作業 implementation to improve compatibility on most devices. A launcher icon must be used.
AppOpsXposed 未運行於Xposed模組。安裝為系統程式 (需要root; 裝置將重啟)?
AppOpsXposed 未運行於Xposed模組，而且無法使用root。
運行於Xposed模組之前，這些設定沒有任何效果！
